author: Troy Alford
name: axis-wiki
description: Node.js Wiki, based on React w/ES6

scripts.develop: npm run serve & npm run jsx-build-dep & npm run watch-jsx & npm run watch-css
scripts.build: npm run clean && (npm run build-jsx & npm run build-css)
scripts.build-css: npm run css-app-build & npm run css-dep-build
scripts.build-jsx: npm run jsx-build-app & npm run jsx-build-dep
scripts.css-app-build: mkdirp build/css && npm run css-app-concat && node-sass build/sass/application.scss -o build/css --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-embed
scripts.jsx-build-app: mkdirp build/js && browserify -x react -x react-dom -x react-router -x react-tinymce -x lodash source/application/Application.js > build/js/application.js
scripts.jsx-build-dep: mkdirp build/js && browserify -r react -r react-dom -r react-router -r react-tinymce -r lodash vendor/dependencies.js > build/js/dependencies.js
